review.comment: Kylie once again has knocked it out of the park this Mama's lashes are on point and round 1 of my body contouring is done can wait for round 2. This busy Mom of 2 is so very thankful Kylie can make me feel human again everything I see her. She is so welcoming and caring and you can tell this girl literally LOVES her job and what she does. If it's a service Heaven Beauty offers it's only because it works.
review.review_reply: Hey, Kimberley!  Kylie sure is AMAZING!!  Thank you for choosing to come to Haven Beauty and for this incredible review and 5-star rating!  Have a wonderful weekend and we'll see you next time!!

review.comment: Kylie is Amazing!!! I was given a HORRIBLE set of lashes from another lash company, I saw Kylie based on a recommendation and never left! This woman is kind, caring, and honest. It's like spending time with a friend! I followed her wherever her business took her! She's worth it! I adore her, and although I no longer have lash extensions, I continually stay up to date on the services she offers, and hope to return to her once again!
review.review_reply: Thank you Tiff!! I can’t wait to see you again soon!!

review.comment: There are an overwhelming number of companies and individuals who provide personal services and it is daunting to choose someone who is skilled, professional and trustworthy.  Look no further than Haven Beauty.  I trust no one else.  Kylie is superbly skilled, knowledgeable, engaging and extremely meticulous with every service she offers.  I can’t give her enough praise.
review.review_reply: Hey, Donna!  Skilled, professional, and trustworthy - woohoo!  Thanks so much for your kind words and taking a moment to leave a 5-star rating!  Have a great week!
Thanks for the 5-stars, Jenna!!

review.comment: Brittany is simply a hair and make-up angel from heaven! Not only did she follow through with my services despite having her only challenging, unforeseen personal circumstances (despite my pleas to re-book), she was professional, kind, hilarious and delivered the glam of my dreams! She clearly used quality products because my look was still flawless after hiking up a mountain and getting caught in a freak snow storm on the day of our elopement. Cannot thank her enough for her big heart and amazing talent! Book her ladies, you will not be disappointed!
review.review_reply: From heaven!?  Wow thank you so much!!  So happy to have been able to help you out!  Thanks for the 5-star rating, Monika!!
Thanks for the 5 shining stars!!

review.comment:
Honestly I am an incredibly picky person when it comes to anything to do with my face - and I wouldn’t trust anyone except Kylie with my lashes and brows. She’s affordable, comfortable to be around, full of life and positivity, and INCREDIBLY knowledgeable and talented when it comes to her work. I have never been happier with my lashes and brows and will follow Kylies business wherever it may go!!
What are you waiting for?

BOOK NOW!!!
review.review_reply: It's good to be picky with things - especially one's own face!  Thank you for the great review and recommendation, Chelsea!!

review.comment: Once again I had a wonderful experience with Kylie! I love my lashes!
review.review_reply: Hey, Carol!  Thanks for the 5-star rating!!

review.comment: I love the quality of Kylies lashes! Thank you!  I highly recommend the services.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the 5-star rating!!

review.comment: Kylie is the queen at what she does. She's professional, high quality and fast. By far the best lashes in Calgary.  I get compliments on my lashes daily. She's also amazing at makeup , brows and all things beauty, not to mention a pretty awesome lady! You're truly missing out if you haven't gone to her yet. Book now, you're gonna be hooked! Xo
review.review_reply: Hey, Courtney!  Wow what an incredible review!  Thank you so much :)

review.comment: Kylie is absolutely AMAZING!! I get at least 3 compliments on my lashes daily!! She is quick and professional and always makes you feel safe and comfortable! Highly recommended. Lashes are life.
review.review_reply: Daily compliments is the goal!  Glad to hear it!  Thank you for the great review!!

review.comment:
Where do I begin!?
I have been seeing kylie for my lashes for almost 10 years now.
That says alot right there. I would not trust or go anywhere else in the city. She knows what she is doing, she has been lashing for years and knows her stuff.
The minute you walk in there she is extremely friendly and professional
I always walk out feeling like a new person with my lashes and re energized.
She will make you feel comfortable and at ease all while making you look beautiful!
I would not go to anyone else, she is the lash guru!
review.review_reply: Hey, Alex!  Thanks so much for your loyalty over the years and thank you for this kind writeup!

review.comment: Kylie is an amazing lash artist. She has been doing it for a long time does an amazing job every time. I always leave her spa feeling beautiful. Best Lash Artist in YYC hands down.
review.review_reply: Hey, Angie!  Glad to hear you always leave feeling beautiful - because you are!!  Thanks so much for the review!

review.comment: Kylie is by far the best there is.  I am a perfectionist to say the least and I wouldn't trust anyone else with my lashes.  Her safety and cleanliness standards are impeccable. I get daily compliments on my lashes.  On top of the product, she is a wonderful human.  I could go on and on.  Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Hey, Carey!  Nothing is quite as rewarding as impressing perfectionists!  Thank you so much for the kind words and 5-star rating!!
Thank you, Craig!!

review.comment: As a long time wearer of lash extensions.... finding Kylie is a dream come true! I had been so frustrated with my previous lashes as well as having very damaged natural lashes and not much left, I went to Kylie who is a true professional and I now have a great set that I love and have always wanted.  Not only do I love these lashes my appointment was a fun one as Kylie is fun, outgoing and not only amazing at her work but she is someone you want to be friends with! I would highly recommend her for lashes and other services as well. Check out her instagram for more proof of great work!
review.review_reply: Hey, Catina!  Making dreams come true everyday!  Haha!  Thanks so much for this awesome review!!

review.comment: Amazing! Absolutely amazing work done by Kylie. Im always speechless leaving there after having my lashes done. Kylie does such amazing work and loves what she is doing. I have nothing but great things to say about her.
review.review_reply: Hey, Kayla!  Gotta love leaving people speechless!  Woohoo!  Thanks for the 5-star rating!!

review.comment: Look no further, Kylie is THE MASTER. I will never trust my lashes with anyone else. Kylie has been my lash tech for over 3 years and corrected someone else’s pathetic attempt at volume Lashes. On top of being extremely talented, she is kind, funny and has the biggest heart. Her space is beautiful and you will not be disappointed.
review.review_reply: Hey, Samantha!  Woohoo!! "THE MASTER" Hahaha!  Thank you so much for your loyalty and for taking a moment to leave this great review!

review.comment: Kylie is so amazing at her job and always makes my lashes look amazing. She is also a very talented makeup artist that did such a great job with myself and my bridal party on my wedding day. Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Hey, Lindsey!  So happy to have been able to help out!  Thanks for your kind words and this 5-star rating!!

review.comment: Kylie is absolutely AMAZING!!!!!! From the minute you enter into her studio, you feel welcome, calm and cozy. Her services are second to none. Every time I leave her studio after any service I feel so pampered and glamourous! SHE IS THE BEST THERE IS!!!!!!
review.review_reply: Hey, Tania!  Pampered and glamorous is what we love to hear!  Thanks so much for the 5-star rating!!

review.comment: Beauty By Kylie YYC is hands down the best place to go for all of your beauty needs!!  I have always left feeling beautiful and completely satisfied with any service I have received.  From lashes to make up for my wedding to eyebrows, she is the best you will find!  I can't recommend her enough.
review.review_reply: Beautiful and completely satisfied is what we love to hear!  Thanks so much for the kind words and 5-star review, Angie!

review.comment:
Kylie has been my beauty guru and dear friend for the past 9 years!
She not only helps me stay pretty and low maintenance with my lash extensions But she also offers a wide variety of other beauty essentials through her amazing company

Kylie was also not only a bridesmaid in my wedding but did all the make up for myself, bridal party and the moms that day! I only trust her for my day to day and special occasion beauty needs

I can not say enough amazing things about Kylie and the passion and care she shows every client
review.review_reply: Hey, Alicia!  Always happy to help out!  Thanks so much for the 5-star rating!!

review.comment: Kylie is by far the best of the BEST when it comes to all things beauty in YYC! She’s the only person I would trust with my lashes, brows, and beauty needs. Not only is she beyond talented; she has an uncanny ability to make all her clients feel completely comfortable in her studio. She’s the most  personal in the industry,  wheater you want to take a nap during your service or tell her everything about your day she’s the best when it comes to making everyone enjoy there time in her studio. Professional with the ability to make you wanna be her best friend. Highly recommend her to everyone I know! I drive an hour to stay her client!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much, Amber!!
